name: desert
description: Let the sands of time guide you on a journey to the ultimate Zen oasis.

name: field
description: Feel your spirit flow with the blades of grass into bliss.

name: mountains
description: Ascend to a heightened sense of self from the mountaintops.

name: snow
description: Fall gently into a meditative state with your winter wonderland.

name: swamp
description: Enjoy the peace of isolation in your personal swamp, far, far away.

name: space
description: Reflect on your place in the world through interstellar travel.
